task.summary: - removed composer autoload. Will use custom one - removed properl since not allowed to use - modified class namespaces so that they fit the directory structure (needed for autoload) - First template implemented (login)

- ViewController implemented which calls newly introduced ActionController if it is ensured that intended action is valid on current view. - Stash caching is working now - Former ViewController is now TemplateController
- mysqli setup and working - AbstractEntityController implemented which opens connectionto db and provides utility methosd for concrete implementations - Login works now for hashed passwords

- view controller now delegates to request controller and handle render view separatelly - RequestControllerResult class implemented - ViewController renders view depending on returned result - copied model to version 2 because will be to extensive
- save user on registration owrks now. - need to use bottstrap form-controls on all forms. Will be done later.
- Added bootstrap form-controll css to login page - downloaded validator-min-0.9.js for bottstrap
- got form controls and validator for bootstrap 3 running on registration and login page
- fixed wrong offset on login form grid col

- some little changes on login and registration. - added redirect/success page on registritation success - started implementation of main.html which contains the main content - Will implement the sub views a spartial views which get updated via jquery
- further development on channel - some restructuring of view controller stuff and how actions are handled - some client side stuff - save of new channel almost finished

- login and logout are working now properly - redirect to login page if user not logged anymore on start page - redirect user to start page is already logged in - channels retrieval working now. Actions are missing - creation of channels works now

- added glyphonics icons - added refactored AbstractRequestController and added function prepareView which provides the parameters for the templates by the actual controller implementation. Renamed handleRequest to handleAction because got split to handleAction and prepareView - Refactored VireController which delegates to the controller on handleAction and prepareView. Added function handleRequest which is unique for this controller type - Assign, remove assigned channel and set favorite are working now on channels view - added ajax status on ajax requests for main view
- started development of channel view which holds the messages within a channel. - switching to this view works, but message load is missing

- removed ddl scripts, will create them when project is finished - display of message within a channel is working properly. Actions are still missing - messages are ordered via date -> time -> importance - added missing files which haven't been added to git yet.

- mark messages as read after load working now - message creator gets message marked as read immediately during post - message user entry does exist right after creation (owner only) and after first load (not owning users) - set important message works now (can be switched marked/unmark) - made timestamp with precision 6 because need to have accurate time set to differ the message creation (seconds only are to little accurate)

- mark messages as read after load working now - message creator gets message marked as read immediately during post - message user entry does exist right after creation (owner only) and after first load (not owning users) - set important message works now (can be switched marked/unmark) - made timestamp with precision 6 because need to have accurate time set to differ the message creation (seconds only are to little accurate)

MESSAGE.value: - removed composer autoload. Will use custom one - removed properl since not allowed to use - modified class namespaces so that they fit the directory structure (needed for autoload) - First template implemented (login)

- ViewController implemented which calls newly introduced ActionController if it is ensured that intended action is valid on current view. - Stash caching is working now - Former ViewController is now TemplateController
- mysqli setup and working - AbstractEntityController implemented which opens connectionto db and provides utility methosd for concrete implementations - Login works now for hashed passwords

- view controller now delegates to request controller and handle render view separatelly - RequestControllerResult class implemented - ViewController renders view depending on returned result - copied model to version 2 because will be to extensive
- save user on registration owrks now. - need to use bottstrap form-controls on all forms. Will be done later.
- Added bootstrap form-controll css to login page - downloaded validator-min-0.9.js for bottstrap
- got form controls and validator for bootstrap 3 running on registration and login page
- fixed wrong offset on login form grid col

- some little changes on login and registration. - added redirect/success page on registritation success - started implementation of main.html which contains the main content - Will implement the sub views a spartial views which get updated via jquery
- further development on channel - some restructuring of view controller stuff and how actions are handled - some client side stuff - save of new channel almost finished

- login and logout are working now properly - redirect to login page if user not logged anymore on start page - redirect user to start page is already logged in - channels retrieval working now. Actions are missing - creation of channels works now

- added glyphonics icons - added refactored AbstractRequestController and added function prepareView which provides the parameters for the templates by the actual controller implementation. Renamed handleRequest to handleAction because got split to handleAction and prepareView - Refactored VireController which delegates to the controller on handleAction and prepareView. Added function handleRequest which is unique for this controller type - Assign, remove assigned channel and set favorite are working now on channels view - added ajax status on ajax requests for main view
- started development of channel view which holds the messages within a channel. - switching to this view works, but message load is missing

- removed ddl scripts, will create them when project is finished - display of message within a channel is working properly. Actions are still missing - messages are ordered via date -> time -> importance - added missing files which haven't been added to git yet.

- mark messages as read after load working now - message creator gets message marked as read immediately during post - message user entry does exist right after creation (owner only) and after first load (not owning users) - set important message works now (can be switched marked/unmark) - made timestamp with precision 6 because need to have accurate time set to differ the message creation (seconds only are to little accurate)

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
